generated_body: If you choose to read the article titled "First Drive! Steeda transforms the Bullitt from leading man to action hero with the Steve McQueen Edition," you can expect a detailed overview of the modifications made by Steeda to the Ford Bullitt. The piece may discuss the enhancements in performance and design that aim to honor the legacy of Steve McQueen, potentially including specifics on engine upgrades, suspension improvements, and aesthetic changes. Additionally, the article is likely to provide insights from automotive experts or enthusiasts who have tested the vehicle, offering a balanced perspective on its driving experience and how it compares to standard models.
